content.question: What is the primary purpose of the instructions?

choices.label: To tell students why the teacher cannot come to class
To explain what students will be doing in class
To remind students to use their computers for homework
To introduce a new substitute teacher to the class

content.answer: To explain what students will be doing in class

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
